SENT.plain: Eighty-four patients with ischaemic stroke aged 18-50 years were analysed
They had been treated in the years 1985-1989
Forty-five of them were followed up
In a high proportion of cases stroke was a result of thrombosis
Many risk factors were found in this group, mainly hypertension
In most cases stroke was serious, in several cases post-stroke epilepsy and poly-infarction dementia developed
